title: How to put an echo dot in pairing mode - Quora

response.answer_text: Thanks for A2A shreya , Step 1: If you haven't already unboxed your Dot, follow the standard setup procedure to get it connected to your home Wi-Fi network. Step 2: Put your speaker in pairing mode. Step 3: Run the Alexa app, tap Menu and then tap Settings. Step 4: Tap the Echo Dot in your list of Alexa Devices, then tap Bluetooth. You will select the Bluetooth option after selecting your Echo Dot… Step 5: Your speaker should appear in the list of Bluetooth Devices. When it does, tap it to complete the pairing process. Select your Bluetooth speaker here From here on out, whenever that speaker is on, your Echo Dot will route all audio to it. If you ever decide you want to remove that speaker, return to the Bluetooth mention, tap the speaker, then tap Forget Device.
